thread.section_title: Munich Ski Shuttle Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von Munich Ski Shuttle | www.munich-ski-shuttle.com
thread.title: Paul
thread.title_full: Munich Ski Shuttle bewertet von Paul

author: Paul
title: Paul
text:
I would highly recommend using this service. The driver was very friendly and refreshments were provided. The transfer to the resort was very easy and went smoothly. The return trip took a lot longer due to checkpoints at the German border. We just about made our flight thanks to some back roads that the driver knew. I think the company should allow more time for return trips like ours where queues at the border on a Sunday are normal. Other than that the interactions before and during our stay were very professional and I'd certainly use the service again.
P.
